sources.title: The Wilderness Road | Full Movie | Action Western
sources.description:
The Wilderness Road tells the story of the most notorious land pirates who stalked the Southeast during the turn of the 19th century. Samuel Mason (Creek Wilson), a Revolutionary War hero, turns to a life of crime and forms a dangerous gang of bandits. Big Harpe (Daulton Brewer) and Little Harpe (Travis Mills), considered by some to be America's first serial killers, wreak havoc through the region as they kill without mercy. Soon, these three outlaws will meet along the wilderness road.
2021.  Stars: Creek Wilson, Travis Mills, Holly Bonney
*Licensed from ITN Distribution. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: One of 12 Westerns made in 12 months during 2020, The Wilderness Road tells the story of the most notorious land pirates who stalked the Southeast during the turn of the 19th century. Samuel Mason (Creek Wilson), a Revolutionary War hero, turns to a life of crime and forms a dangerous gang of bandits. Big Harpe (Daulton Brewer) and Little Harpe (Travis Mills), considered by some to be America's first serial killers, wreak havoc through the region as they kill without mercy. Soon, these three outlaws will meet along the wilderness road.
metadata.Writer: Tony Gavin, Renee Luke Jordan, Travis Mills
metadata.Actors: Damon Burks, Dunky Capraro, Daulton Brewer
